```{r,echo=FALSE,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
theme_set(theme_classic())

library(readr)
path_ready <- "_data/data_ready"

source(here::here("_scripts/functions.R"))
```

```{r,warning=FALSE}
d <- read_csv(here::here(path_ready, "ready_cues.csv"), show_col_types = FALSE)
```

```{r}
#| label: fig-1
#| fig-cap: "Verbal Cue Use Distribution"

d %>%
  pull(ver_pc) %>%
  hist(main = "Histogram of Verbal Cues",
       xlab = "Verbal Self-Report",
       col = "lightblue",
       breaks = 10)
```

```{r}
#| label: fig-2
#| fig-cap: "Verbal Cue Use - Behavior Type Subset"

d %>%
  filter(psb1 == 1, psb_act == "Penetration") %>%
  pull(ver_pc) %>%
  hist(main = "Histogram of Verbal Consent (Penetration Only)",
       xlab = "Verbal Consent Score",
       col = "lightblue",
       breaks = 10)
```
